TO_NAME.HEADING: Subject

IMAGE.HEADING: Pictures
IMAGE.HELP: Upload up to 4 images you want to share. To upload more than one image, you have to select them all at once. This can be achieved by copying all files in the same folder before. Maximum file size is 4MB per image. Skip this field if you choose to not share any images.

STORY.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your story here as detailed as you can, because what you have to say matters!

WANNA_DO_NEVER_DID.HEADING: Wanna do but never did
WANNA_DO_NEVER_DID.HELP: Is there something you always wanted to do with me, but never did? Now is the time to tell me all about it.

SURPRISE.HEADING: Surprising facts
SURPRISE.HELP: Surprise me and tell me something about you I do not already know!

LIKED.HEADING: The best
LIKED.HELP: What do you like the most about me?

DISLIKED.HEADING: The worst
DISLIKED.HELP: Sometimes, things do not play out exactly as you wanted them to. Are there experiences we shared we do not have to live through again? Tell me about them!

WILL_MISS.HEADING: Missing the most
WILL_MISS.HELP: Let's be honest, you will miss me when I'm gone, right? What is it you will miss the most?

SECRET_TO_SHARE.HEADING: Secret
SECRET_TO_SHARE.HELP: Is there a secret you always wanted to share with me but never found the time to do so? Well, now is the time, go ahead!

GOODBYE.HELP: Soon I'll be gone for a while. Any last words?
